scripts.all-in-one: (npm run docker-test:stop || echo 0) && (npm run docker-app:stop || echo 0) && npm run reinstall-build && npm run prettier-lint && npm run docker-test
scripts.docker-app: (npm run docker-app:start || echo 0) && (npm run docker-app:stop || echo 0)
scripts.docker-app:restart: (npm run docker-app:stop || echo 0) && npm run reinstall-build && npm run docker-app:start
scripts.docker-app:start: npm run docker-app:image-build && npm run docker-app:container-up && (docker logs -f %npm_package_name%-app-1 || docker logs -f $npm_package_name-app-1 || echo 0)
scripts.docker-app:stop: npm run docker-app:container-down && npm run docker-app:image-remove && npm run docker-app:volume-remove
scripts.docker-app:volume-remove: (docker volume rm %npm_package_name%_app || docker volume rm $npm_package_name_app || echo 0)
scripts.docker-test: (npm run docker-test:start || echo 0) && (npm run docker-test:stop || echo 0)
scripts.docker-test:restart: (npm run docker-test:stop || echo 0) && npm run reinstall-build && npm run docker-test:start
scripts.docker-test:start: npm run docker-test:image-build && npm run docker-test:container-up && (docker logs -f %npm_package_name%-test-1 || docker logs -f $npm_package_name-test-1 || echo 0) && (docker cp %npm_package_name%-test-1:/app/coverage/ coverage || docker export $npm_package_name-test-1:\app\coverage\ coverage || echo 0)
scripts.docker-test:stop: npm run docker-test:container-down && npm run docker-test:image-remove && npm run docker-test:volume-remove
scripts.docker-test:volume-remove: (docker volume rm %npm_package_name%_test || docker volume rm $npm_package_name_test || echo 0)
scripts.install-build:production: npm run install:production && npm run build
scripts.prettier-lint: npm run prettier-lint:simple && npm run prettier-lint:simple && npm run prettier-lint:simple
scripts.prettier-lint:simple: npm install && npm run prettier && npm run lint
scripts.reinstall-build: npm run clean && npm run install-build
scripts.reinstall-build:production: npm run clean && npm run install-build:production
scripts.test-coverage:complete: npm run test-coverage:unit && npm run test-coverage
scripts.update-dependencies: npm run clean && npm install && npm audit fix --force && ncu --upgrade && npm run reinstall-build
scripts.update-dependencies:peer: npm run clean && npm install && npm audit fix --force && ncu --upgrade --peer && npm run reinstall-build
